snippet: After an arrest at 22, Donta James swore off dealing drugs but tried some of the crack cocaine he had peddled. He was hooked for more than 15 years.
abstract: Community Service Society of New York, one of seven organizations supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Donta James, Manhattan bakery worker, pay for vocational training.
